techmeme.title: White House crypto and AI czar David Sacks says China has grown adept at evading US export controls and is at most two years behind US chip design capabilities (Jackie Davalos/Bloomberg)
Scale AI emphasizes that it remains an independent company and says Meta will not have access to Scale's internal systems or customers' confidential information (Scale AI)
Scale AI's rivals like Snorkel AI, Labelbox, and Turing report rising interest from clients concerned about Scale's independence after Meta's $14.3B investment (Bloomberg)
Careem, Uber's ride-hailing MENA arm, will suspend its decade-old Pakistan service on July 18, citing economic challenges, competition, and capital constraints (Ariba Shahid/Reuters)
OpenAI warns that its upcoming models could pose a higher risk of enabling the creation of biological weapons and says it is stepping up testing of such models (Ina Fried/Axios)
